description: Male pilot, bitter about not receiving Station Commander position. Responsible for the initial sabotage that killed three people.
cluesForIdentification: Found in storage room being strangled. Present in Scene 1 (sabotage) and Scene 5 (watching from doorway). His confession note may be discovered by Hans. Context clues: he's the one who sabotaged the servers, visible through his positioning in early scenes.

description: Male geologist who killed Robert Miller in self-defence during a food raid, then murdered Lisa Park in delusional rage after finding her with a radio. Consumed by guilt, he took his own life.
cluesForIdentification: Found hanging in storage room (Scene 6). Present in Scene 3 shooting Robert with flare gun in self-defence. Present in Scene 5 killing Lisa with fire extinguisher after accusing her of withholding help. Context clues: his descent from defensive action to paranoid murder to suicide shows psychological breakdown. Positioned in East Wing initially with Maria.

description: Male meteorologist, frozen to death outside the station after Martinez's sabotage caused power failure and emergency exit lockout. Died alongside Dr. Sarah Chen during the blizzard.
cluesForIdentification: Found collapsed against sealed door outside station, snow covering body. Emergency keypad shows red "LOCKED" light. Only appears in Scene 2. Context clues: visible through window in Scene 1 during the explosion, tried desperately to open emergency exit and override the system. Called out for help as the blizzard raged and temperature dropped.

description: Female biologist who attempted to avenge Robert Miller's death by attacking with a scalpel. Killed by Hans Mueller defending Alex Petrov.
cluesForIdentification: Found in West Wing corridor lunging with scalpel (Scene 4). Present in Scene 3 covering mouth in horror as Alex shoots Robert. Context clues: positioned in East Wing initially with Alex, witnessed Robert's death, attempted retaliation against perceived murderers. Medical supplies scattered nearby.

description: Female station commander, frozen to death outside the station after Martinez's sabotage caused power failure and emergency exit lockout. Was the target of Martinez's resentment - he believed he deserved her position. Died alongside Dr. James Wilson during the blizzard.
cluesForIdentification: Found collapsed against sealed door outside station, snow covering body. Emergency keypad shows red "LOCKED" light. Only appears in Scene 2. Context clues: tried to override the emergency exit system after the power went out. Martinez sabotaged the server room specifically to destroy her climate research data and make her look incompetent. She apologized to James as they froze together.

description: Male engineer, killed instantly while trying to fix Martinez's sabotaged wiring in the server room. Was attempting to prevent the explosion when it occurred.
cluesForIdentification: Found in server room killed by electrical explosion while reaching for damaged wiring. Only appears in Scene 1. Context clues: he was trying to disconnect the sabotaged power lines, visible reaching toward the wiring when the explosion happened. Martinez was present and thrown back by the blast.

description: Male cook who led a raid on the East Wing kitchen after weeks of starvation in the West Wing. Killed by Alex Petrov in self-defence whilst attacking with a kitchen knife.
cluesForIdentification: Found falling in East Wing kitchen with kitchen knife in hand (Scene 3). Context clues: weeks of isolation and food shortage drove desperate raid attempt. Shot with flare gun by Alex. Scattered empty food tins on floor indicate starvation conditions. Positioned in West Wing initially.
